description:
DOCS Operations Manager

Kuala Lampur, Malaysia

This is an exciting opportunity to work within a fast paced, busy environment for a leading global provider of outsourced development services to the pharmaceutical, biotechnology and medical device industries.

Through combined functional, operational and talent expertise, DOCS offer resourcing solutions and FSP models that significantly improve business performance. This person will effectively manage Contract Placement Consultants (CPCs) who are insourced to a client, ensuring high performance, quality delivery of client objectives and continuous development of DOCS CPCs.

DOCS homepage: https://www.docsglobal.com/

ICON Functional Services Provision (IFS): https://www.iconplc.com/services/functional-services-provision/

Job Functions and Responsibilities:

The responsibilities of the Operations Manager include, but are not limited to:

Complete DOCS induction and orientation for newly employed CPCs.
Ensure client-specific induction and orientation is planned, communicated and completed.
Establish goals and objectives for each CPC.
Monitor performance and conduct annual appraisal for each CPC, as applicable.
Conduct regular 1:1 meetings with assigned CPCs
Ensure timely submission and approval of time reports, expense reports and leave requests for assigned CPCs
Manage non-rechargeable expenses for assigned CPCs, per regional guidelines.
Create a positive relationship between DOCS, the CPC and the client to ensure retention.
Conduct accompanied site visits, if applicable / approved
Ensure timely identification, resolution and escalation of issues.
Implement, monitor and ensure appropriate completion of a Corrective Action Plan, if required.
Monitor and update relevant CPC data.

Client Relationship Management:

Establish routine teleconference and meeting schedule with client contact(s) to effectively manage client relationship.
Obtain regular client feedback to ensure CPCs are meeting performance expectations and PDPs are aligned with client goals.
Agree Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) with client and periodically review results.
Ensure compliance with time and expense reporting requirements of client contracts.
Collaborate with client to forecast resource requirements.
Ensure DOCS understands current client procedures and expectations.
Proactively plan for contract extensions, completions and terminations in collaboration with client and relevant DOCS departments.

Qualifications, Experience & Skills:

Bachelor's Degree or local equivalent, in life sciences, medicine or related discipline.
Minimum of 5 years of relevant industry experience as Sr. CRA, Lead CRA, Project Lead or CRA Manager
Previous experience in clinical project management or/and line management is preferred but not mandatory.
Demonstrated ability to identify, analyze and solve problems.
Excellent interpersonal, organizational and management skills.
Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English and Mandarin.
Strong computer skills.
Ability to operate in a multi-cultural environment.

Job Type: Full-time

Pay: RM8,400.00 - RM14,000.00 per month

Benefits:

Additional leave
Flexible schedule
Health insurance
Meal allowance
Parental leave
Professional development
Work from home

Schedule:

Flexible hours
Monday to Friday

Experience:

Clinical Research: 5 years (Required)
People Management: 1 year (Preferred)

Work Remotely:

Yes

description:
Papa Palheta is looking for a Web Developer to be part of our expanding Sales & Marketing department - you will be working closely with the Digital Marketing and Online/Ecommerce Operations team to develop the front-end and back-end applications of our product. Reporting to the Head of Sales & Marketing located in Singapore, you will be working remotely from Kuala Lumpur.

Responsibilities

Develop overall architecture of Shopify-based website
Work closely with Product Managers, Digital Marketing and Online/Ecommerce Operations team to enhance UI/UX experience
Propose, develop and launch new features on the Shopify-based website
Lead and manage any special projects from conceptualisation to implementation
Maintain quality and ensure responsiveness of Shopify-based website
Ensure website is optimised for cross-browser/cross-platform compatibility
Provide consolidated sales reports from various data channels
Write code integrity and organization to ensure it’s scalable, maintainable, and reusable
Ensure data security across all platforms, in line with Singapore’s Personal Data Protection Act

Requirements

Possess a Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Info Technology or related subjects
Have a minimum 2-3 years of experience in web development
Experience in developing and integrating external APIs with Shopify, as well as other servers
Highly experienced in Ruby/Ruby on rails or Node.js or any compatible server-side language
Proficiency with HTML5, CSS3 and Javascript/JQuery
Understanding and usage of relational and non-relational databases (GraphQL for Shopify)
Experience with cloud computing architectures (AWS, Google Cloud or Azure) to operate both developments, production servers
Self-motivated, creative and efficient in proposing solutions to complex, time-critical problems
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with a high attention to detail
Strong communication skills in English (both written and verbal)
Must enjoy working within a collaborative environment and display leadership skills
Experience with Shopify, and/or be able to learn and develop custom Shopify Theme using Shopify’s section theme architecture is a plus
Experience working in retail and with online/ecommerce industry will be a bonus

About Papa Palheta (M) Sdn. Bhd.:

PPP Coffee, formerly known as Papa Palheta, is a leading specialty coffee boutique, specialising in sourcing, roasting and serving specialty coffee, in Singapore and Malaysia. Established in 2009, our mission is to inspire and connect people through coffee, fostering a sense of belonging across communities. In 2019, we rebranded ourselves to PPP Coffee, and founded the PPP Coffee store. Designed to provide a multi-sensory coffee retail experience for the community , the PPP Coffee store also serves as an employee-store modelled after the loyalty co-op for F&Bs, where profits are shared with employees across the group, regardless of rank, positions, roles or responsibilities. This, is essentially, our founder's love letter to the employees. PPP Coffee also operates Chye Seng Huat Hardware in Singapore, and PULP in Malaysia.

description:
[CANDIDATES WHO REQUIRE WORK PASSES NEED NOT APPLY]

Traineeship Description

CapitaLand is one of Asia’s largest diversified real estate groups. CapitaLand believes in growing its business in a sustainable manner to create long-term value for its investors and improve the economic and social well-being of its communities. The Group’s sustainability efforts have been consistently recognised globally. The Trainee will report to CapitaLand’s Chief Sustainability Officer, and will be part of the team to make an important contribution to CapitaLand’s ambitious elevation of its international best-in-class Environment Social Governance (ESG) performance and leadership position.

Responsibilities

Liaise with internal and external stakeholders to develop and implement various initiatives on the “environment, health and safety” (EHS) pillar of sustainability (Subjects include cutting-edge climate change and carbon advice, low energy transition, water conservation, waste management and climate resilience.)
Assist to monitor and report on emerging global EHS trends and regulation directions to feed into CapitaLand’s strategies, including the product roadmaps, working alongside CapitaLand’s business and product development units to define future improvement plans
Assist to design strategy and action plan to implement the EHS pillar of CapitaLand’s sustainability strategy, maximise opportunities and minimise risks with a view to creating/improving economic value for the business
Assist to drive and engage with CapitaLand’s business units and corporate functions to ensure full implementation and integration of EHS, including internal education, training, disseminating knowledge, best practice and standards
Analyse and provide insight from data, measure performance and complete gap analysis against industry indices and best practice.
Participate in any other Sustainability projects as directed

Requirements

Degree in Sustainability/ Environmental Science/ Environmental Management/ Environmental Engineering or relevant technical disciplines
Applicants with the relevant technical academic qualification without work experience may apply
Passionate in energy and sustainability topics, such as developing greenhouse gas (GHG) strategies and inventories, carbon emissions inventories, water and waste footprints, and other environmental inventories
Entrepreneurial interest in growing a strategic platform within an expanding company
Strong organizational and planning skills, demonstrated flexibility in approach and proactive can-do attitude
Self-motivated, independent and results oriented with an analytical mindset, as well as a team player

The Traineeship with the Company will end on 5 Aug 2021.
title: Executive, Sustainability #SGUnitedTraineeships

description:
Mission Consultancy Services Malaysia is looking for an experienced SAS 9.3/9.4 administrator and technicalexpert in installation, configuration, and maintenance of SAS Enterprise BI Server and also provide End User Support for various SAS products (SAS EBI, EM, EDM or ESP) and also liaise with the In Country and Regional SAS support teams.

This position is for one of our clients which is one of the largest Malaysian Commercial Bank and you will be working in Bank’s premises, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.

JOB ROLE

The SAS Platform Administrator/Architect will be responsible for providing overall SAS platform Architecture and Administrative support. Primary duties include maintenance, enhancements installation and support quick architecture changes for SAS Products (EBI, EM, ESP, EG). Also includes providing SAS platform security management, SAS application and underlying infrastructure support and ensuring processes are aligned and complaint with internal policies as well as regulatory requirements.

PRIMARY RESPONSIBILITIES

Routine administration, monitoring, maintenance, and tuning of the SAS Enterprise BI server (9.3/9.4) Platform and knowledge in SAS applications (SAS EBI, EM, EDM or ESP)

Hands on experience in supporting for SAS maintenance, installation, upgrades, user support, resolving technical issues, working with SAS technical support team, Internal IT and provided technical support to operation team for automation and deployment of solutions.

Provide leadership and direction with respect to architecture, design, and implementation for the SAS Platform

Design solutions to reduce the operational and management complexity of the platform and to increase reliability and performance

Perform new installations and upgrades as needed and routinely apply hot fixes

Design, implement, and maintain platform security through SAS metadata and Windows OS

Manage automated job scheduling

Perform platform capacity planning

Lead efforts to provide SAS technical and programming support to users

Collaborate with IT and database administrators to support

ongoing operations

QUALIFICATIONS :

5+ years of hands-on experience as a SAS Administrator for a multi-tier SAS Platform in a Linux and Windows environment
Hands-on experience on SAS 9.3, SAS 9.4 GRID Administration having SAS Metadata Server, SAS Application server, SAS Object spawner, SAS Connect server, SAS Olap server, AS Connect server, SAS Content server.
Having good experience in working on Linux environment and Linux commands.
Experience in working on SAS standalone and GRID having multiple node GRID Environment.
Excellent knowledge of SAS Enterprise server platform using SAS Management Console.
Good installation and configuration of SAS Metadata Server, SAS Application Server and Mid-tier server.
Extensive install, configure and support experience in SAS/Access interface to Oracle, MS-SQL Server, Teradata and Hadoop.
Excellent experience in troubleshooting issues related to SAS Enterprise guide, SAS Enterprise miner, SAS DI studio and other SAS components.
Experience in migrations and user migration from old server to new server.
Experience in applying hot fixes on the SAS Components.
Excellent knowledge on SAS license Renewals.
Excellent knowledge in USERS, GROUPS AND LIBRARIES creation.
Good knowledge on client web-based applications like sas studio and sas web report studio.
Excellent support to analytics groups for all the issues related to connecting SAS Servers using SAS Components.
Good hands –on experience in dealing with SAS server restarts.
Good hands on experience in dealing with SAS Webservers hosting various SAS applications
Advanced knowledge of Base SAS, SQL, and the SAS macro language (at the SAS Certified Advanced Programmer level)
Experience with data quality, data management, and ETL
Banking or Financial Services Experience Preferred
BS in Computer Science, Economics, Statistics, Math or related fields

description:
Job Description

We are looking for a driven and enthusiastic Sales and Marketing Executive to help us with our aggressive expansion efforts in Indonesia. SAPELO LIFE SCIENCES is a boutique animal pharmaceutical research firm. We specialise in the discovery and the synthesis of research drugs for universities, research labs and clinics research uses. We are the top Southeast Asia distributor of animal pharmaceuticals specifically targeting the treatment for pets.

Given that for many people, their pets are an important part of their family, there is a large untapped market for animal pharmaceuticals. With the right talent in place, we’re looking to cement our reputation as the top company to provide our furry friends with the medications needed to live a long and happy life.

For this role, we’re looking for someone who will play an integral part of the development and execution of sales and marketing plans for the company. From brand awareness to product promotion, you will also work cross functionally with the sales team to achieve sales goals, complete post sales customer satisfaction surveys, and be the go-to person if our customers have any inquiries about our products.

You should be a competent professional, able to grasp consumer behaviour trends and generate creative ideas to better communicate our product value and service to our customers based in Philippines. The goal is to deliver effective marketing and sales initiatives that will build our brand and product awareness, and grow our sales steadily.

RESPONSIBILITIES

- Conducting market research to find answers about our consumer requirements, habits and trends.

- Brainstorming and developing ideas for creative marketing campaigns

- Assisting in outbound or inbound marketing activities by completing tasks including, but limited to content development, advertising optimisation, events planning.

- Liaise with external resellers, promoters, and distributors to run campaigns and increase sales.

- Collaborate with marketing and other professionals to coordinate brand awareness and marketing efforts.

- Plan and execute initiatives to reach the target audience through social media.

- Analyse marketing data (campaign results, conversion rates, traffic etc.) to drive better results in future marketing efforts.

- Complete individual tasks as assigned on a satisfactory level.

REQUIREMENTS:

* Hiring Filipino national who lives in Malaysia. We are able to offer a work visa for the right candidate.

* Good communications skills both verbal and written in Tagalog and English. Proficiency in Mandarin would be a plus.

* Able to work on a flexible schedule. Be ready to work on tasks 7 days away on rare occasions.

* Understand and execute directions from superiors well. Have independent ideas on improving the company overall operations.

* takes initiative and ownership of assigned duties.

* Social Media marketing strategy expert. Experience building social media pages, groups, and community.

* Previous experience working at a fast paced start-up a plus.

INDUSTRY

Pharmaceutical

Professional development

description:
Golden Bridge Drive is an on-line game development company based in Singapore and Taiwan. We are developing an online eco-system (game integration, account management, merchant platform, payment platform, risk control platform, big data analysis platform, cloud service platform and etc.) and providing technology services and solutions to gaming business operators all around the world. The company was founded in 2012 and has been in fast growing pace ever since. The business has been a great success thanks to the strong demands, and we are currently growing the team.

About the role:

As our Data Architect, you are responsible to design and implement effective database solutions and models to store and retrieve company data.

Roles and Responsibilities:

Examine and identify database structural necessities by evaluating client operations, applications, and programming.
Assess database implementation procedures to ensure they comply with internal and external regulations.
Install and organize information systems to guarantee company functionality.
Prepare accurate database design and architecture reports for management and executive teams.
Oversee the migration of data from legacy systems to new solutions.
Monitor the system performance by performing regular tests, troubleshooting, and integrating new features.
Recommend solutions to improve new and existing database systems.
Educate staff members through training and individual support.
Offer support by responding to system problems in a timely manner.

Qualifications:

Bachelor’s degree in computer science, engineering, business, or relevant field of study.
Experience with centralized reporting platform built on top of Lambda pattern, Data warehouse, Data Lake.
Strong knowledge of database structure systems and data mining.
Excellent organizational and analytical abilities & outstanding problem solver.
Experience with API design experience.
Proficiency in Java and Python languages is preferable.
Strong Cloud-architecture experience, specially AWS.
Possess on-premise system architecture experience.
Strong understanding of containerizations (Docker, Kubernetes).
Strong NoSQL and SQL knowledge.
Good written and verbal communication skills in English.

Thank you for your interest to join Golden Bridge Drive, Due to the large number of applicants, only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

Minimum of 5 year(s) experience needed for this position
title: Data Architect

description:
Are you looking for an exciting opportunity to move your career path forward?

UPS is seeking a passionate, results-driven Manager to join our winning team in order to accelerate our International Sustainability Programme. Focused on Asia but also supporting work elsewhere. You will drive innovation and stakeholder engagement programmes in order to position UPS as the leading provider of sustainable logistics.

Position Summary:

UPS's Sustainability team drives the development and execution of the organisation's environmental and social sustainability strategy. We seek a Manager to join the team in support of this work. Reporting to the Vice President of International Sustainability based in London but working closely with the Vice President of Public Affairs for APAC in Singapore and the entire APAC management team. The manager will develop initiatives to position UPS as the leading provider of sustainable logistics solutions in APAC, as well as supporting the sustainability strategy elsewhere in International. This will include developing and implementing innovation and stakeholder engagement programmes by working cross functionally within UPS and also with external partners. This is a full-time position based in our APAC Region Office in Singapore.

Essential Duties and Responsibilities:

Engage with APAC management team to develop APAC sustainability priorities for 2021 and beyond.
Work internally and cross-functionally in APAC to develop buy-in to the priorities.
Develop environmental and social innovation programmes in APAC to execute to the priorities, including working with Automotive and the Advanced Technology Group on new technology last mile solutions.
Develop stakeholder engagement programmes in APAC to execute to the priorities, including working with customers to develop partnerships and with employees to inspire them in our sustainability journey.
Provide APAC input into the annual Corporate Sustainability Report.
Represent the UPS brand by speaking at conferences and engaging in interviews in conjunction with Communications.
Support and provide cover for sustainability work elsewhere in International as needed.

Requirements:

Bachelor’s Degree in Engineering or equivalent discipline is preferred.
Minimum 5 years of relevant working experience performing in a similar capacity.
Preferably from Transportation and Logistics industry. Open to any industry provided with Business experience.
A passion for sustainable development, both social and environmental, coupled with an understanding of the role of business in providing solutions.
Excellent networking and influence skills.
Very strong written and oral communications skills.
Highly numerate, comfortable handling data.
A solid grasp of the science of greenhouse gas and air quality emissions and an aptitude for the engineering and technology solutions required.
Willingness to travel, typically for one week but for up to 2 weeks, and to work occasional anti-social hours.
Fluent in English (verbal, written, presentation); Fluent in Mandarin highly preferred.
title: International Sustainability Manager (based in Region Office)

description:
[CANDIDATES WHO REQUIRE WORK PASSES NEED NOT APPLY]

Why Work for Us

We Power the Nation.

Make the most of your talents and develop products that can create impact on a national scale. We are an inhouse software team, assembled to move with speed and deliver with quality.

We Build Reliable Solutions. For Customers, Company and Country .

You will be part of the Digital Technology Team and together, you will innovate, create, and deploy digital products that will empower more than 3,800 employees within SP Group and improve the quality of life for the 1.5 million commercial, industrial and residential customers that SP Group serves. We build solutions that enable sustainable high-quality lifestyles and help consumers save energy and cost, as well as supporting national goals for a sustainable liveable city.

Now, imagine the impact you can create.

Overview:

SP Digital Technology aims to use cutting edge technologies to help SP Group to revolutionize future utility/energy industry by providing better services and more efficient energy solutions to our customers. Data charter consists of data engineering, business intelligence, data science/machine learning teams. We oversee and drive all data and AI initiatives for SP group. It includes the following

Build next generation data infrastructure to collect/process/analyse different data from consumers, assets, energy
Discover the business problems/opportunities and design data-driven solutions to improve operation/business/customer experience
Uncover the actionable insights for multiple stakeholders to drive business growth

The mission of data team is to drive SP to become data-driven company and create data-driven products. As a data team member, you will be responsible for designing, developing and deploying data-driven solutions to create business value. We are looking for a Data Scientist who will help us discover patterns hidden in large amounts of data and make decisions from different sources. Your primary focus will be in applying data wrangling and machine learning techniques to build high quality anomaly detection, prediction and recommendation systems integrated with our products. You will work closely with customers and data engineers to understand the business requirements, in-house infrastructure and help build solutions for different business users.

What You'll Do

Understand business logics from domain experts and come up with reasonable targets for data projects.
Data fetching from different sources such as database, big data lake running on hadoop/hive.
Enhancing data by building autonomous pipelines from different sources Data wrangling by preprocessing, cleansing, and feature engineering.
Applying state-of-art machine learning techniques such as RNN, CNN for predictions and anomaly detections.
Build agile data products in a team of data engineers, scientists and business users.
Doing ad-hoc analysis and presenting results in clear manner.
Guide junior team members on their projects Help find opportunities from different business partners.

What You'll Need

We are looking for Passion and Proficiency

Data-oriented personality and software engineering practices
Excellent understanding of machine learning models, their pros and cons
Experience with common data science toolkits such as Python/R
Experience with data visualization tools such as D3.js, matplotlib and etc
Proficiency in using query languages such as SQL, Hive
Good understanding of statistics, such as distributions, A/B testing, model overfitting/underfitting
Experience with one of deep learning libraries such as Tensorflow, Keras, Pytorch, CNTK, MXNet etc
Master or PhD of Computer Science/Engineering, Applied Mathematics or other engineering related area

We regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified

description:
The Senior Data Visualization Consultant is responsible for the design, development, and delivery of visualization- based solutions. This position collaborates with business partners across client facing divisions, product/ project management, analytics, operations, and IT to enable data-driven strategic decisions. This position identifies enhancement opportunities for existing visualization products and supports new product development.

Responsibilities

Analyze or produce reports of varied claims data to assess Prime’s products and/or programs; utilize analytics to explore data, identify trends, and draw insights from multi-faceted and high dimensional data
Assist stakeholders in achieving objectives through the development of prototype and production-supported metrics and dashboard visualizations
Act as a business intelligence and visualization subject matter expert by training and supporting clients and team members in the creation of visualizations, along with the use and interpretation of data
Collaborate with internal stakeholders to define business requirements and develop/document solution design; develop strategic partnerships with various levels of leadership and analyst teams within the organization
Support enterprise adoption of Tableau software by educating stakeholders on how to leverage the dashboards and reporting features; recommend solutions or data formatting in both internal and external presentations and provide visualization tool training to resources to the business
Conduct maintenance and fine-tuning of dashboard design; support the business in the identification and mitigation of data issues; apply industry best practices to the management and maintenance of visualization design
May coach and provide guidance to other members of the team
Stays abreast of and shares industry best practices, information and technology; establishes relationships with technology vendors to influence product pipeline; gain deeper insights in how best to utilize adopted products
Other duties as assigned

Minimum Qualifications

Bachelor’s degree in applied math, statistics, engineering, physics, accounting, finance, economics, computer sciences or business/social and behavioral science or related area of study, or the equivalent combination of education and/or relevant work experience; HS diploma or GED is required
5 years of work experience in business intelligence, building visualizations/dashboards based upon large data sets and/or experience working with complex queries
3 years of experience with dashboard generating technologies (like Tableau (v9.0 or higher), Tibco Spotfire, Qlik View, etc.)
Must be eligible to work in the United States without need for work visa or residency sponsorship

Additional Qualifications

Demonstrated understanding of data modeling, data analysis, and data management principles using SQL, SAS, and other related technologies
Strong project management background and ability to work with developers, testers, designers, and other disciplines of development work
Prior experience leading cross-functional product development projects
Excellent communication and cross functional collaboration skills
Enhanced organizational skills with the ability to work on multiple projects simultaneously
Demonstrated ability to problem solve and interpret complex data
Ability to establish rapport and effectively influence at all levels within an organization

Preferred Qualifications

7 years of work experience in business intelligence, building visualizations/dashboards based upon large data sets and/or experience working with complex queries
Experience in Big Data and Data Analytics
Familiarity with Atlassian stack (Confluence and JIRA)
Knowledge of Tableau optimization and tuning
Business Intelligence consulting experience
Prior experience with data consolidation and modeling
Prior PBM experience or experience working with medical claims, pharmacy claims, healthcare and/or benefits data
Experience in the implementation of quality process improvement efforts

Minimum Physical Job Requirements

Constantly required to sit, use hands to handle or feel, talk and hear
Frequently required to reach with hands and arms
Occasionally required to stand, walk and stoop, kneel, and crouch
Occasionally required to lift and/or move up to 10 pounds and occasionally lift and/or move up to 25 pounds
Specific vision abilities required by this job include close vision, distance vision, color vision, peripheral vision, depth perception and ability to adjust focus

Reporting Structure

description:

About the Company

Founded in 2012, ByteDance is a technology company operating a range of content platforms that inform, educate, entertain and inspire people across languages, cultures and geographies. With a suite of more than a dozen products, including TikTok, Douyin, Toutiao, Helo and Resso, ByteDance now has a portfolio of applications available in over 150 markets and 75 languages.

Team Introduction

Given the fast growth of ByteDance in the world, we are in the midst of creating revolutionary platform ByteDance products. Our team is responsible for data analysis of the core business in ByteDance. With various innovative projects that are being incubated, data can be used to guide the innovative business from 0 to 1, starting from the fundamentals; it can also be analyzed to find the direction of breakthroughs and empower mature products to continue to grow. Our responsibility is to find the most suitable indicators and dimensions from data generated ever day to find insights that can be optimised from the business innovation, and to implement our findings into growth.

You are:

You have broad and deep knowledge in data science and analytics and are proficient in analyzing and implementing data-related projects. The successful candidate will design and build analytics solutions and products to deliver superior business outcomes, across all aspects of the business.

You will:

Work directly with Product Marketing Manager to size the potential impact of "problems-to-solve" for the ByteDance business globally.
Implement standardized product reports, ad hoc queries, and data related projects
Design and implement reporting dashboard and associated data pipeline to deliver valuable insights.
Exploratory analysis and research to discover potential bottlenecks to suggest improvement and workflow of internal teams.

Qualifications

Bachelor's Degree in Data Analytics or relevant field.
At least 2 years of related working experience in Data Science.
Fluency in SQL.
Proven experience in conducting rigorous data analysis, data-driven projects from definition to execution: defining metrics, experiment design, communicating actionable insights to both technical and non-technical audiences.

description:
Moving Walls was formed with a vision to enable future “Smart Cities”. Our expertise in Smart Media, Smart Data, and Smart Content – some of the fastest-growing, billion-dollar industries – is evident in the solutions we provide:

Moving Audiences – for intelligent outdoor placements. It is already the largest network of digital screens in Asia.
Moving Insights – audience location data to power hyperlocal targeting. Our platform can measure any location in the world without additional hardware deployment.
Moving Experiences – immersive content for engaging brand experiences. We use augmented reality, virtual reality, mobile applications, gamification, and more to transform brand messages

Why Join Us?

We live by our #NoBoundaries manifesto. If you're an innovator and a trailblazer who thrives in a fast-paced and technology-driven work environment then you fit the bill.

Join us to move walls.

Apply now to anuradha@movingwalls[.]com or visit our careers page at http://www.movingwalls.com/

We want you to:

Gather and process raw data at scale (including writing scripts, web scraping, calling APIs, write SQL queries, etc.
Conduct deep dives into data trends and potential data irregularities using advanced analytics and statistical methods
Develop, validate, and maintain weighting methodologies, sampling techniques, outlier detection, and statistical modelling for new and existing products
Analyse historic trends and construct a mathematical model for forecasting
Identify business insights, trends and opportunities based of your analyses
Create data dashboards and visualisation of key metrics to communicate insights
Ensure that insights can be integrated onto our suite of Moving Audience Platforms
Make strategic recommendations on data collection, integration and retention requirements
Work with Sales & Engineering, as well as clients or media agencies to gather client data when required
Engage with external data suppliers as well as internal stakeholders to build data products
Recommend ongoing improvements to methods, such as new data sources and data platforms
Work closely with team members,Marketing, & Sales to ensure client brief/requirements are viable and delivarable

JOB REQUIREMENTS

You have:

Bachelors degree or higher in Mathematics, Statistics, Computer Science, Quantitative Sciences or other related fields.
Experience in trend analyses, multivariate statistics, bias reduction, data aggregation techniques, automation
Domain expert in at least one area: Demography, Sampling, Statistics Modeling, Research Practices, Audience Measurement, and/or Weighting.
Proficiency in Microsoft Excel: Ability to generate pivot tables, generate reports and identify trends
Proficient in SAS, SPSS, R, Stata or other statistical packages
Knowledge of Tableau or similar BI and data vizualization tools
Proficiency with Social Analytics tools such as Google analytics, Omniture Sitecatalyst, Webtrekk
2 year(s) or more of working experience in the related field
Advertising/Media Planning background preferably

ADDITIONAL INFORMATION

You have:

4+ years experience in the application of statistical modelling, machine learning, & data mining
Bachelor's degree or higher in Mathematics, Statistics, Computer Science, Quantitative Sciences or other related fields
Experience in trend analyses, multivariate statistics, bias reduction, data aggregation techniques & automation
Domain expert in areas such as Demography, sampling, statistical modelling, audience measurement, and weighting
Proficient in Microsoft Excel, SPSS, R, Stata, Tableau or other data vizualization tools
Proficiency with Social Analytics tools such as Google Analytics, Omniture Sitecatalyst, Webtrekk
Solid skills in SQL for data extraction and manipulation
Solid skills in either Python & R

SKILL LEVEL

Senior Executive

SALARY RANGE

RM4000 - RM8000
title: Data Analytics Lead

description:
[CANDIDATES WHO REQUIRE WORK PASSES NEED NOT APPLY]

COMPANY DESCRIPTION

About NTUC Link Private Limited

As part of the Group of Social Enterprises under Singapore’s Labour Movement, NTUC Link Private Limited ('Link') was incorporated in 1998 with the key focus of improving the lives of its members by stretching their spending dollar on everyday expenses. Today, Link has transformed beyond a loyalty programme to become a digitally-enabled and data-driven organization. Focused on e-commerce, consumer research, advanced analytics and payments, it offers an engagement platform that delivers value to members and merchants through the most seamless, data-rich, and omni-channel approach. Digital transformation has enabled NTUC Link to enhance and introduce its consumer and business service offerings respectively; namely Plus! and Plus! For Business.

Plus! is one of Singapore’s largest and most successful multi-partners loyalty programme, allowing members to earn and redeem loyalty points (LinkPoints) across a variety of lifestyle merchants. With the new Plus! App, Plus! Members can access an array of deals and offers, check their LinkPoints balance, collect stamps from purchases, use digital vouchers and redeem rewards.

Plus! For Business is a suite of business solutions that provides data-based products and services to businesses of all scales. Through advanced analytics and data science, it helps businesses to effectively target their most relevant customers so as to grow acquisitions and sales.

NTUC Link’s service offerings Plus! and Plus! For Business collectively reach over 2 million individuals, touches 90% of households, comprises more than 270 merchants and is available at more than 1200 outlets across Singapore.

To achieve the goals in our digital transformation, we've brought in a diverse set of talents from various industries and backgrounds to work with our pioneers for the next lap of our journey.

We're re-writing the playbook and breaking the rules; and there's never been a better time to be on-board. So, if you want to join us on this exciting ride, take a look at the opportunities on our Job Site to connect with us today.

For more information on NTUC Link and Plus!, visit http://www.plus.com.sg

RESPONSIBILITIES

About Us

NE Digital - Our Centre of Excellence for Data, Digitalization and Technology was setup to lead the transformation of the NTUC Social Enterprises by leveraging digital technologies to become more nimble, adaptable and innovative in today’s digital age.Our group of social enterprises aims to create a greater social force to do good by harnessingthe capabilities of the social enterprises to meet pressing social needs in areas like health and eldercare, childcare, daily essentials, cooked food and financial services. Serving over two million customers, NE Digital together with our group of social enterprises will enable and empower all in Singapore to live better and more meaningful lives through our transformation journey.

The Team

We believe that diversity is key to driving an innovative, cohesive, productive and fun workplace! Hence, at NE Digital our people join us from all around the world. Be sure to be soaked in anenvironment with different ethnic groups driving innovation and injecting some creative juice asone!Contributing to a social purpose through technology, our team of passionate and dedicated folksare spread into different social enterprises such as NTUC Fairprice Group, NTUC First Campus, NTUC Health and among others! Creating technologies that impact!

Job Description

NE Digital is currently hiring for Team Lead to join the Partnership Analytics team supporting NTUC Link which operates Plus!, one of Singapore’s leading loyalty and rewards programs that connects over 2 million members to merchants offering everyday deals across online and offline channels. A key component in Link’s digital transformation is the use of tech and data analytics to track, understand, model and personalize the customer journey for Plus! members. This position will be reporting directly to Head of Marketing Analytics.

The Partnership analytics team supports and drives the business growth for 10-15 top key merchants in the Plus! Ecosystem. In addition to that, the candidate should have some managing experience and interest to work with CRM data to translate data from raw form to insights to drive marketing budget to be optimized on the right things.

This position is tasked with executing a mix of data science and data analytics, geared towards i) delivering actionable insights to aid business strategy; ii) developing predictive models toincrease customer engagement and personalize communications.

You should be proficient in the application of data science on customer transaction and campaign data, and a variety of semi-structured/unstructured data, to produce solutions in areassuch as customer segmentation and targeting, lookalike modeling, item recommendation systems, and marketing attribution.

QUALIFICATIONS

Bachelor or Masters in Statistics, Mathematics, Computer Science, Operations Research, Physics, Economics, Knowledge Engineering, Data Analytics, or a related quantitative field.
Solid understanding of statistical analysis, machine learning and experimental design.
Proficiency in SQL and either Python or R.ï‚· Hands on experience with development of end-to-end data analytics solutions including data exploration/crawling, model building and performance evaluation.
Team player who can build strong partnerships and collaborations with the business.
Experience communicating complex data and insight to business audience.
Creative problem-solving skills, to identify pain points, conceptualize solution while balance complexity and effort in process & technology changes.

Please note that your application will be sent to and reviewed by the direct employer - NTUC LINK

description:
Matrix Global Schools in Malaysia is looking for a Secondary English Teacher to join their international school in late August 2021.

All class teachers in the Secondary section are empowered to provide creative and dedicated teaching for our students, supporting their development and transition to a post secondary educational institution. We are looking for inspirational teachers who will put the students’ needs first.

English Teachers with experience teaching a Humanities or Social Science classes are invited to apply.

We Are Looking For:

Matrix welcomes applications from professionally qualified, experienced primary teacher who completed their training in countries such as Canada, The US, Ireland, The UK, Australia or New Zealand and who are looking to apply their knowledge, classroom practice and enthusiasm at a dynamic international school just outside of Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.

At Matrix you will be encouraged and supported in your efforts to support all students with their learning. You will be provided the tools necessary to demonstrate excellent subject knowledge in core subjects. You will be provided with resources that will allow you to apply ICT positively in the classroom in order to enhance learning and teaching.

We value previous experience in working with the International Secondary Curriculum (IPC) but also welcome experienced teachers who are able to show very good understanding of the National Curriculum for England and Wales and who have kept up-to-date with curriculum developments, show awareness of learning and new teaching developments.

In addition to your classroom responsibilities our teachers we look to our teachers to make positive contributions to the life of the school, actively support their own professional development and their peers', and to lead co-curricular activities (CCAs) for Primary and/or Secondary students in an area of your interest.

KEY TASKS AND RESPONSIBILITIES

Learning and teaching

Being a dedicated teacher, supporting all students with their learning.
Demonstrate excellent subject knowledge in English and an additional subject.
Ensure lessons are thoroughly planned, prepared and delivered.
Provide quality lessons where learners consistently achieve the desired learning objective(s).
Assess and analyze student data and place appropriate systems in place to address underperformance or further challenge.
Plan and lead two co-curricular activities (CCAs) for Primary and/or Secondary students in an area of your interest.

Personal and professional qualities

Work effectively with students, teachers and parents from various nationalities.
Has a positive approach to working within school structures.
Share good learning and teaching practices with staff and parents.
Set consistently high expectations for learners. • Meet deadlines punctually.
Make positive contributions to the life of the school. • Understand and apply relevant school policies and procedures.

Continuous professional development (CPD)

Participate in regular INSET sessions or school training.
Participate in your own internal or external training for continuous professional development.
Keep up-to-date on child protection and safeguarding issues.

Other responsibilities

To cover any other appropriate duties as allocated by the MIS Secondary Leadership Team or Head of English.

About The School:

Matrix Global School, Malaysia is located in Seremban, the capital of Negeri Sembilan province. For information about the surrounding area / town visit: https://www.sendayan.com.my/

The Matrix Campus spans 20 acres and current has approx. 715 students. Experience more about life at Matrix by viewing this video - Click HERE

What can you expect?

Students who are tremendously motivated and enjoy coming to school
An atmosphere that allows you to do what you are trained to do, teach rather than control
Working with highly qualified energetic colleagues
Working with supportive parents who value education
A forward-looking school that believes in continuous improvement and gives you opportunities to innovate
Excellent facilities and generally resourced curriculum in a relatively new building
A wide range of co-curricular activities.
The opportunity to travel extensively and experience the beauty of Malaysia and Asia

Salary and Benefits:

An excellent package of benefits is on offer, including:

Two-year renewable contract (extended each year by agreement)
Housing allowance of RM$1,500.00 per month
Medical, dental benefits and hospitalization (surgical) insurance coverage for you and your dependents
Personal accident insurance coverage
Flight tickets at the beginning and end of contract for you and your dependents to and from home country
Malaysia work permit fees borne by company
Excess baggage allowance of RM$1,000.00
Employee Pension Fund contributions equal to 12% of your basic salary - contribution made by the school.
School fees waiver of 100% for first child, 50% for second child and 25% for third child
Membership at d’Tempat Country Club
Support for professional development

Please apply now or email us at Teachers@byronrecruitment.com

Visit our Open Roles page to look at all the great teaching opportunities we have across Asia and around the world. Click HERE

RM$11,000 - RM$19,700 / month

description:
[CANDIDATES WHO REQUIRE WORK PASSES NEED NOT APPLY]

The National Dental Research Institute Singapore (NDRIS), the research division of the National Dental Centre Singapore (NDCS), aims to be a leading institute for oral health research globally, renowned for translating research into practice to improve oral health and general health. The NDRIS is seeking an experienced data manager to develop large scale studies in dentistry and oral health. The incumbent will be working with large amounts of highly complex confidential electronic health data from multiple sources, including electronic health records, population registries and clinical studies. The position requires experience in managing large datasets, data linkage, quantitative analysis of large observational datasets, longitudinal or panel data analysis methods, and Econometrics.

The candidate will undertake hands-on research and management responsibilities and will assist the Principal Investigator to design the data collection and management strategy for registries under the NDRIS Singapore Oral Population Health Initiative (SOPI) and its links with SingHealth, Duke-NUS registries..

Duties and Responsibilities

Develop research protocols (which include requirements, scope, deliverables, budget and schedules), Institutional Review Board (IRB) application, set up and manage effective study procedures.
Formulate techniques for quality data collection to ensure adequacy, accuracy and legitimacy of data
Establish rules and procedures for data sharing with upper management and external stakeholdersIdentify, manage and track issues, risks and dependencies that affect the delivery of the project outcome.
Support others in the daily use of data systems and ensure adherence to legal and company standards
Assist with reports and data extraction when needed
Monitor and analyze information and data systems and evaluate their performance to discover ways of enhancing them (new technologies, upgrades etc.)
Ensure digital databases and archives are protected from security breaches and data losses

Requirements

BSc/BA in computer science or relevant field
Candidate should posses at least 8 years of experience with demonstrated competency at the managerial level
Excellent understanding of data administration and management functions (collection, analysis, distribution etc)
Familiar with modern database information system technologies
Proficient in MS Office (Excel, Access, Word etc.)

description:
Job Description

We are looking for a driven and enthusiastic Sales and Marketing Executive to help us with our aggressive expansion efforts in Indonesia. SAPELO LIFE SCIENCES is a boutique animal pharmaceutical research firm. We specialise in the discovery and the synthesis of research drugs for universities, research labs and clinics research uses. We are the top Southeast Asia distributor of animal pharmaceuticals specifically targeting the treatment for pets.

Given that for many people, their pets are an important part of their family, there is a large untapped market for animal pharmaceuticals. With the right talent in place, we’re looking to cement our reputation as the top company to provide our furry friends with the medications needed to live a long and happy life.

For this role, we’re looking for someone who will play an integral part of the development and execution of sales and marketing plans for the company. From brand awareness to product promotion, you will also work cross functionally with the sales team to achieve sales goals, complete post sales customer satisfaction surveys, and be the go-to person if our customers have any inquiries about our products.

You should be a competent professional, able to grasp consumer behaviour trends and generate creative ideas to better communicate our product value and service to our customers based in Philippines. The goal is to deliver effective marketing and sales initiatives that will build our brand and product awareness, and grow our sales steadily.

RESPONSIBILITIES

- Conducting market research to find answers about our consumer requirements, habits and trends.

- Brainstorming and developing ideas for creative marketing campaigns

- Assisting in outbound or inbound marketing activities by completing tasks including, but limited to content development, advertising optimisation, events planning.

- Liaise with external resellers, promoters, and distributors to run campaigns and increase sales.

- Collaborate with marketing and other professionals to coordinate brand awareness and marketing efforts.

- Plan and execute initiatives to reach the target audience through social media.

- Analyse marketing data (campaign results, conversion rates, traffic etc.) to drive better results in future marketing efforts.

- Complete individual tasks as assigned on a satisfactory level.

REQUIREMENTS:

* Hiring Filipino national who lives in Malaysia. We are able to offer a work visa for the right candidate.

* Good communications skills both verbal and written in Tagalog and English. Proficiency in Mandarin would be a plus.

* Able to work on a flexible schedule. Be ready to work on tasks 7 days away on rare occasions.

* Understand and execute directions from superiors well. Have independent ideas on improving the company overall operations.

* takes initiative and ownership of assigned duties.

* Social Media marketing strategy expert. Experience building social media pages, groups, and community.

* Previous experience working at a fast paced start-up a plus.

INDUSTRY

Pharmaceutical

description:
Mission Consultancy Services Malaysia is looking for an experienced SAS 9.3/9.4 administrator and technicalexpert in installation, configuration, and maintenance of SAS Enterprise BI Server and also provide End User Support for various SAS products (SAS EBI, EM, EDM or ESP) and also liaise with the In Country and Regional SAS support teams.

This position is for one of our clients which is one of the largest Malaysian Commercial Bank and you will be working in Bank’s premises, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.

JOB ROLE

The SAS Platform Administrator/Architect will be responsible for providing overall SAS platform Architecture and Administrative support. Primary duties include maintenance, enhancements installation and support quick architecture changes for SAS Products (EBI, EM, ESP, EG). Also includes providing SAS platform security management, SAS application and underlying infrastructure support and ensuring processes are aligned and complaint with internal policies as well as regulatory requirements.

PRIMARY RESPONSIBILITIES

Routine administration, monitoring, maintenance, and tuning of the SAS Enterprise BI server (9.3/9.4) Platform and knowledge in SAS applications (SAS EBI, EM, EDM or ESP)

Hands on experience in supporting for SAS maintenance, installation, upgrades, user support, resolving technical issues, working with SAS technical support team, Internal IT and provided technical support to operation team for automation and deployment of solutions.

Provide leadership and direction with respect to architecture, design, and implementation for the SAS Platform

Design solutions to reduce the operational and management complexity of the platform and to increase reliability and performance

Perform new installations and upgrades as needed and routinely apply hot fixes

Design, implement, and maintain platform security through SAS metadata and Windows OS

Manage automated job scheduling

Perform platform capacity planning

Lead efforts to provide SAS technical and programming support to users

Collaborate with IT and database administrators to support

ongoing operations

QUALIFICATIONS :

5+ years of hands-on experience as a SAS Administrator for a multi-tier SAS Platform in a Linux and Windows environment
Hands-on experience on SAS 9.3, SAS 9.4 GRID Administration having SAS Metadata Server, SAS Application server, SAS Object spawner, SAS Connect server, SAS Olap server, AS Connect server, SAS Content server.
Having good experience in working on Linux environment and Linux commands.
Experience in working on SAS standalone and GRID having multiple node GRID Environment.
Excellent knowledge of SAS Enterprise server platform using SAS Management Console.
Good installation and configuration of SAS Metadata Server, SAS Application Server and Mid-tier server.
Extensive install, configure and support experience in SAS/Access interface to Oracle, MS-SQL Server, Teradata and Hadoop.
Excellent experience in troubleshooting issues related to SAS Enterprise guide, SAS Enterprise miner, SAS DI studio and other SAS components.
Experience in migrations and user migration from old server to new server.
Experience in applying hot fixes on the SAS Components.
Excellent knowledge on SAS license Renewals.
Excellent knowledge in USERS, GROUPS AND LIBRARIES creation.
Good knowledge on client web-based applications like sas studio and sas web report studio.
Excellent support to analytics groups for all the issues related to connecting SAS Servers using SAS Components.
Good hands –on experience in dealing with SAS server restarts.
Good hands on experience in dealing with SAS Webservers hosting various SAS applications
Advanced knowledge of Base SAS, SQL, and the SAS macro language (at the SAS Certified Advanced Programmer level)
Experience with data quality, data management, and ETL
Banking or Financial Services Experience Preferred
BS in Computer Science, Economics, Statistics, Math or related fields

description:
Involve in the setup and maintenance of a genomic laboratory according to GLP standard guideline

Participate in development and execution of Quality Assurance and Quality Control procedures for medical diagnostics, analytical tests, scientific reports and standard procedures.

Conduct key scientific research for development of novel infectious disease vaccine and interpret experimental data to determine follow-up activities.

Conduct lab procedures in virus handling/infectivity techniques including virus Inactivation, Ribonucleic Acid Isolation, Polymerise Chain Reaction (qPCR) and perform and report technical work in containment laboratory (BSL-2)

Develop productive international collaborations and communications with potential international experts and manage external collaborative research activities including writing and revising of process development reports and technology transfer protocols as per local regulatory requirements.

Maintain a current understanding of relevant literature and scientific advances relevant to specific projects.

Provide technical training

· PhD or Master in Biological Sciences, Cancer Research, Molecular/Cell Biology, Biotechnology, Medical Science with 4 years of experience in post-graduate research and / industry.

· Having experience and scientific knowledge in microbiology, virology, Gene expression profiling, microRNA and signalling pathways is required

· Experience with qPCR is highly desirable

· Experience with gene therapy vectors and/or Viral Transfection technique is highly desirable

· Prior industrial experience, particularly in technology transfer and project development strategies is required.

· Good understanding of regulatory standards for product registration and clinical trial activity is preferred.

· Fluent spoken and written English and Strong communication and teamwork skills are essential as the candidate is expected to interact with international collaborations.

· Ability to work in a high paced inter-disciplinary and capable of performing work on off shifts.

· Advanced computer skills and statistical analyses

· Good clinical Practice (GCP) certified is an advantage

Must be willing to be deployed to the company’s respective locations.

Dental insurance
Health insurance

We are looking for a Senior IT Business Analyst to support, explore and enhance the current business and tool-based processes in our IT Tool Services team and to provide professional advice to build digital solutions in our application landscape, which combines mobile applications and cloud-based solutions with one of the largest SAP ERP (S/4 HANA) single instance implementations in the world.

You will be in our strategic IT location in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, and be part of a team of process consultants, solution architects, software engineers, project managers, and business counterparts, which are located all over the world. In this highly challenging and motivating environment, we provide you the opportunity to interact with business counterparts and to take over responsibilities for crucial parts of the team.

What does the role involve?
In this challenging global role, your core areas of responsibilities will be:

As the global expert for systems and processes all-around product information, you will consult, train and support the Global Marketing community with the right setup for their product data and information in preparation for product launches.
You will drive and support the continuous improvement of the systems based on the feedback from your daily interaction with the users. In doing so, you will work closely with your teammates and the IT department.
Based on your capabilities you will drive and support projects to further improve and enhance the system landscape.

Requirement:

Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Information Systems, Computer Science, Business Administration, or related fields with Cumulative Grade Point Average > 3.5 or similar grading is a must. Ph.D. will be an added advantage.
At least 5 years of experience in SAP ERP modules like SD, SM, CS, or similar.
Knowledge and experience in SAP ERP (S/4 Hana) environment will be an added advantage.
Proven business acumen and customer focus providing solutions to add value.
Demonstrated strong analytical, problem-solving, organizational, interpersonal, and communication skills required.
Creativity, willingness to embrace new ideas and methodology.
Fluent in English (both spoken and written)
Below 45 Years old

What do we offer?
Show us what you’re made of and we’ll offer you opportunities to move around the business – to work abroad, experience different job functions, and tackle different markets. It’s a great way to find the right match for your ambitions and achieve the exciting career you’re after.

We have a very thorough people review process, unlike any we know of in any other business. We can pair talent with opportunities - developing our people in their current roles or challenging them to work in new ways or in new places. It’s how we find the right fit, further our teams personally and professionally, get the best value for each employee, and increase job satisfaction. Additionally, we offer you a wide range of benefits.

Remuneration:
Salary: Up to RM15,000

Job Type: Full-time

Salary: RM1.00 - RM15,000.00 per month

Schedule:

Monday to Friday

Experience:

SAP ERP modules : 5 years (Required)

Education:

Bachelor's (Required)

Work Remotely:

No

Data Migration Manager (Telco)

Working hour: 9am-6pm (Mon-Fri)

Responsible for the Data Migration track as part of the implementation of a large-scale Operating Support System /Business Support System (OSS/ BSS) to ensure the successful conversion of data in the current systems to the new system.

Responsibilities:

Delivery and Technical Management

Lead and manage the entire Data Migration track from inception through to post-live in accordance with the agreed Scope of Work

Partner the incumbent vendors, new vendor, user champions and IT teams in the following:

Develop the data migration strategy for the conversion of data from the current systems, including standalone files, into the new system

Prepare and execute data migration plan

Develop the entire Data Migration Work Plan clearly depicting all tasks/activities and the associated target completion dates and owners

Facilitate the following between the new vendors, incumbent vendors and user champions:

Migration processes and operation

Data and object mapping between source and target data sets

Mapping may involve multiple source systems to single target

Data conversion requirements

Ensure data readiness for training, all testing stages

Data reconciliation and remediation plan, exception handling and fallout

Data migration test plan including test and quality reviews

Oversee the testing of different data loads with a view of identifying underlying issues and remediation plans and follow up to ensure complete closure by the appropriate stakeholders

Lead and coordinate with the user champions, IT peers and IT teams in the following:

Perform source system data analysis

Identify data cleansing rules and methods

Manage, coordinate and track the data cleansing activities

Develop Data Templates, Tools and Cleansing guidelines and techniques

Quality reviews

Identify, analyse issues, make recommendations, and escalate issues for resolution in a timely manner

Manage the reporting and data warehousing solution delivery from vendor(s)

Support deployment of solution, cutover planning and execution activities

Provide weekly and ad-hoc progress updates

Ensure that designated IT vendors meet contractual obligations

Develop approval papers for additional data migration services

Attend to any other reasonable duties as assigned by the Project Director

Risk Management

Manage the Company’s contractual obligations for data migration

Manage and track the data migration scope, timelines, milestones and committed deliverables closely

Identify and communicate project risks (technical and non-technical) impacting time, quality and cost of deliverables

Develop the mitigation plans with the Project Management team and relevant stakeholders and ensure the timely execution of the risk mitigation plans

Track and maintain the Action Items log, Issues log, Risk Log for data migration

Stakeholder and People Management

Work with all internal and external stakeholders to achieve project goals

Requirements:

• Degree in IT/ Computer/ Telecommunications Engineering/ equivalent with 8 years experience in implementing a telecommunication operational support system, business support system, enterprise software system

Strong technical knowledge in the areas of telco network fibre technologies, models and architecture, telecommunications engineering and operations.

Have experience in business and requirements analysis, systems engineering and software implementation, project management, ETL, data migration, testing and production migration

Hands-on experience in ETL, data migration, testing, production migration of Network Inventory /GIS such as GE SmallWorld and Hexagon Intergraph G/Technology for Network Planning

Hands-on experience in data migration, testing, production migration of OSS/BSS - Order Management /Service Provisioning, Service Assurance, Work Force Management, CRM, Finance, Warehouse, Data Management systems.

SME in Oracle or MS SQL database, data migration scripts, PL/SQL or SQL database programming, database design, database tuning

Possess good interpersonal skills, deep analytical skills, excellent communication skills

Strong vendor management and negotiation skills

Experienced in managing and interfacing face-to-face with users and vendors/product groups/developers as well as technical skills.

Able to influence and negotiate well

CYBER Security Analyst

Working hour: 9am-6pm (Mon-Fri)

Responsible for the maintaining of and improving the organization’s cybersecurity posture on an ongoing basis working with external experts to implement security solutions, and work with vendors to monitor, detect and contain cybersecurity incidents to minimize impact to the organization.

Responsibilities:

Review and develop security framework, information security policies, processes / procedures and guidelines on an ongoing basis

Work with vendor to conduct security assessments and penetration tests

Identify security gaps, perform threat risk assessments in current setup and propose mitigating measures

Standardize and refine security incident response and escalation processes

Mitigate and contain threats when detected

Escalate security incidents and non-compliances on a timely basis

Work with IT infrastructure team to evaluate, implement and enhance the network perimeter security, endpoint security, SIEM

Monitor information security alerts triage, mitigate, and escalate issues as needed

Conduct information security awareness training

Provide security advisory to end users on regular basis

IT Security Management of various aspect, e.g. network security, server security, application security, end point security, email security, physical access security, logical access security, etc.

Keep abreast of industrial IT security advancements and introduce appropriate security enhancements to IT infrastructure and systems

Requirements:

Degree in Engineering, Science/ IT/ equivalent with 5-6 years experience in cybersecurity management and security governance

Possess CISSP, CISM/ equivalent IT security certifications. CISA certification will be advantageous

Prior IT security consulting and/or IT Network experience will be advantageous

Good working knowledge of security risk management, security governance framework and compliance (IT Security Audit /log review), technical vulnerability management (vulnerability assessment, penetration testing), application security, security technologies (system hardening, IDS/ IPD, firewall), security incident response and security assessment

Strong understanding of ISO27001 standard

Hands-on experience at least 4 of the following IT Security Tools:

a. Next Generation Firewall (e.g., FortiGate, Palo Alto, Cisco FirePower)

b. Tenable Security Center Continuous View

c. Endpoint Protection (e.g., Symantec, Trend Micro, Sophos Endpoint)

d. Email Security (e.g., FireEye ETP, Cisco Email Security)

e. Data Loss Prevention (e.g., Symantec, ForcePoint, Digital Guardian)

f. SIEM (e.g., Splunk, QRadar)

Have understanding of Risk Management, Disaster Recovery, Business Continuity and IT Regulatory Compliance

Excellent interpersonal and communication skills

To handle the collection, storage, analysis, manipulation and rectification of complex geographical information which capture the company core business.
